subject: Law
title: Non-Compete Agreements
description: Learn Non-Compete Agreements in one minute.

hook.text: You quit your job and start a competing business. Your former employer suesâ€”you signed a non-compete.

buildup.text: Non-compete agreements restrict employees from working for competitors for a set period after leaving.

discovery.text: Courts enforce them only if they're reasonable in scope, duration, and geography.

twist.text: The FTC proposed banning most non-competes nationwide, arguing they suppress wages and limit worker freedom.

climax.text: California already bans them entirely. Other states are following. The legal landscape is shifting fast.

punchline.text: Protecting business secrets is fair. Trapping workers isn't.

quiz.question: What must a non-compete agreement be to be enforceable?
options: Reasonable in scope, duration, and geography
